fixed_skill.desc: 65.1/68.4/71.6% chance to inflict Forget on 1 foe for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Makajama

innate_skill.desc: Increase 1 ally's Attack by 15.5%/16.3%/17.0%. For every 500 of the user's Attack, increase the target's Attack by 1.3%/1.4%/1.4% more, up to 10.4%/10.9%/11.4%. Lasts for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Tarukaja

innate_skill.desc: Decreases damage taken by 6.1% when it rains.
innate_skill.name: Raindrop Barrier I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. When 3 or more foes are on the field, increase ailment accuracy by 32%.
passive_skill.name: Mystery of the Woods

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 5.8%. When 3 or more foes are on the field, increase ailment accuracy by 37.5%.
passive_skill.name: Mystery of the Woods I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
